info.name: ebyte-lora-e32-circuitpython
info.summary: Ebyte E32 LoRa circuitpython library device very cheap and very long range (from 3Km to 8Km). Arduino LoRa EBYTE E32 device library complete and tested with Arduino, esp8266, esp32, STM32 and Raspberry Pi Pico. sx1278/sx1276.
